info.description: With the Services API, you can build applications that help service providers get and modify their service orders and manage their resources.
info.title: Selling Partner API for Services

get.description:
Gets details of service job indicated by the provided `serviceJobID`.

**Usage Plan:**

| Rate (requests per second) | Burst |
| ---- | ---- |
| 20 | 40 |

The `x-amzn-RateLimit-Limit` response header returns the usage plan rate limits that were applied to the requested operation, when available. The table above indicates the default rate and burst values for this operation. Selling partners whose business demands require higher throughput may see higher rate and burst values than those shown here. For more information, see [Usage Plans and Rate Limits in the Selling Partner API](doc:usage-plans-and-rate-limits-in-the-sp-api).

put.description:
Cancels the service job indicated by the service job identifier specified.

**Usage Plan:**

| Rate (requests per second) | Burst |
| ---- | ---- |
| 5 | 20 |

The `x-amzn-RateLimit-Limit` response header returns the usage plan rate limits that were applied to the requested operation, when available. The table above indicates the default rate and burst values for this operation. Selling partners whose business demands require higher throughput may see higher rate and burst values than those shown here. For more information, see [Usage Plans and Rate Limits in the Selling Partner API](doc:usage-plans-and-rate-limits-in-the-sp-api).

get.description:
Gets service job details for the specified filter query.

**Usage Plan:**

| Rate (requests per second) | Burst |
| ---- | ---- |
| 10 | 40 |

The `x-amzn-RateLimit-Limit` response header returns the usage plan rate limits that were applied to the requested operation, when available. The table above indicates the default rate and burst values for this operation. Selling partners whose business demands require higher throughput may see higher rate and burst values than those shown here. For more information, see [Usage Plans and Rate Limits in the Selling Partner API](doc:usage-plans-and-rate-limits-in-the-sp-api).

parameters.name: serviceOrderIds
parameters.description: List of service order ids for the query you want to perform.Max values supported 20.

parameters.name: serviceJobStatus
parameters.description: A list of one or more job status by which to filter the list of jobs.

x-docgen-enum-table-extension.description: Jobs which are not serviced.
Jobs which are cancelled.
Jobs successfully completed.
Jobs which are pending schedule.
Jobs which are not fulfillable.
Jobs which are on hold.
Jobs for which payment was declined.

parameters.name: pageToken
parameters.description: String returned in the response of your previous request.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: A non-negative integer that indicates the maximum number of jobs to return in the list, Value must be 1 - 20. Default 20.

parameters.name: sortField
parameters.description: Sort fields on which you want to sort the output.

x-docgen-enum-table-extension.description: Sort on job date.
Sort on job status.

parameters.name: sortOrder
parameters.description: Sort order for the query you want to perform.

x-docgen-enum-table-extension.description: Sort in ascending order.
Sort in descending order.

parameters.name: createdAfter
parameters.description: A date used for selecting jobs created at or after a specified time. Must be in ISO 8601 format. Required if `LastUpdatedAfter` is not specified. Specifying both `CreatedAfter` and `LastUpdatedAfter` returns an error.

parameters.name: createdBefore
parameters.description: A date used for selecting jobs created at or before a specified time. Must be in ISO 8601 format.

parameters.name: lastUpdatedAfter
parameters.description: A date used for selecting jobs updated at or after a specified time. Must be in ISO 8601 format. Required if `createdAfter` is not specified. Specifying both `CreatedAfter` and `LastUpdatedAfter` returns an error.

parameters.name: lastUpdatedBefore
parameters.description: A date used for selecting jobs updated at or before a specified time. Must be in ISO 8601 format.

parameters.name: scheduleStartDate
parameters.description: A date used for filtering jobs schedules at or after a specified time. Must be in ISO 8601 format. Schedule end date should not be earlier than schedule start date.

parameters.name: scheduleEndDate
parameters.description: A date used for filtering jobs schedules at or before a specified time. Must be in ISO 8601 format. Schedule end date should not be earlier than schedule start date.

parameters.name: marketplaceIds
parameters.description: Used to select jobs that were placed in the specified marketplaces.

parameters.name: asins
parameters.description: List of Amazon Standard Identification Numbers (ASIN) of the items. Max values supported is 20.

parameters.name: requiredSkills
parameters.description: A defined set of related knowledge, skills, experience, tools, materials, and work processes common to service delivery for a set of products and/or service scenarios. Max values supported is 20.

parameters.name: storeIds
parameters.description: List of Amazon-defined identifiers for the region scope. Max values supported is 50.

The table above indicates the default rate and burst values for this operation. Selling partners whose business demands require higher throughput may see higher rate and burst values than those shown here. For more information, see [Usage Plans and Rate Limits in the Selling Partner API](doc:usage-plans-and-rate-limits-in-the-sp-api).

Selling partners whose business demands require higher throughput may see higher rate and burst values than those shown here. parameters.name: serviceJobId
parameters.description: A service job identifier to retrive appointment slots for associated service.

parameters.name: marketplaceIds
parameters.description: An identifier for the marketplace in which the resource operates.

parameters.name: startTime
parameters.description: A time from which the appointment slots will be retrieved. The specified time must be in ISO 8601 format. If `startTime` is provided, `endTime` should also be provided. Default value is as per business configuration.

parameters.name: endTime
parameters.description: A time up to which the appointment slots will be retrieved. The specified time must be in ISO 8601 format. If `endTime` is provided, `startTime` should also be provided. Default value is as per business configuration. Maximum range of appointment slots can be 90 days.

resources.description: List of resource objects to be assigned.

totalResultSize.description: Total result size of the query result.

nextPageToken.description: A generated string used to pass information to your next request. If `nextPageToken` is returned, pass the value of `nextPageToken` to the `pageToken` to get next results.

previousPageToken.description: A generated string used to pass information to your next request. If `previousPageToken` is returned, pass the value of `previousPageToken` to the `pageToken` to get previous page results.

jobs.description: List of job details for the given input.

createTime.description: The date and time of the creation of the job in ISO 8601 format.

serviceJobStatus.description: The status of the service job.

x-docgen-enum-table-extension.description: Indicates that the service for the service job is not complete.
Indicates that the service job is cancelled.
Indicates that the service is performed and the service job is closed successfully.
Indicates that an appointment for the service job has not been scheduled.
Indicates that the service job is not actionable due to an unexpected exception.
Indicates that the appointment time preference given by customer cannot be serviced by the service provider.
Indicates that the customer payment has been declined.

scopeOfWork.description: The scope of work for the order.

seller.description: Information about the seller of the service job.

serviceJobProvider.description: Information about the service job provider.

preferredAppointmentTimes.description: A list of appointment windows preferred by the buyer. Included only if the buyer selected appointment windows when creating the order.

serviceOrderId.description: The Amazon-defined identifier for an order placed by the buyer in 3-7-7 format.

storeId.description: The Amazon-defined identifier for the region scope.

associatedItems.description: A list of items associated with the service job.

serviceLocation.description: Information about the location of the service job.

ServiceJob.description: The job details of a service.

ServiceJobId.description: Amazon identifier for the service job.

OrderId.description: The Amazon-defined identifier for an order placed by the buyer, in 3-7-7 format.

asin.description: The Amazon Standard Identification Number (ASIN) of the service job.

title.description: The title of the service job.

requiredSkills.description: A list of skills required to perform the job.

ScopeOfWork.description: The scope of work for the order.

sellerId.description: The identifier of the seller of the service job.

Seller.description: Information about the seller of the service job.

serviceJobProviderId.description: The identifier of the service job provider.

ServiceJobProvider.description: Information about the service job provider.

phone.description: The phone number of the buyer.

isPrimeMember.description: When true, the service is for an Amazon Prime buyer.

startTime.description: The date and time of the start of the appointment window in ISO 8601 format.

durationInMinutes.description: The duration of the appointment window, in minutes.

AppointmentTime.description: The time of the appointment window.

appointmentTime.description: The time of the appointment window.

assignedTechnicians.description: A list of technicians assigned to the service job.

rescheduledAppointmentId.description: The identifier of a rescheduled appointment.

Technician.description: A technician who is assigned to perform the service job in part or in full.

appointmentTime.description: The time of the appointment window.

uploadingTechnician.description: The identifier of the technician who uploaded the POA.

uploadTime.description: The date and time when the POA was uploaded in ISO 8601 format.

asin.description: The Amazon Standard Identification Number (ASIN) of the item.

quantity.description: The total number of items included in the order.

orderId.description: The Amazon-defined identifier for an order placed by the buyer in 3-7-7 format.

x-docgen-enum-table-extension.description: Indicates the item is yet to be shipped.
Indicates the item has been cancelled.
Indicates the item is shipped but not delivered.
Indicates the item is delivered.

brandName.description: The brand name of the item.

AssociatedItem.description: Information about an item associated with the service job.

estimatedDeliveryDate.description: The date and time of the latest Estimated Delivery Date (EDD) of all the items with an EDD. In ISO 8601 format.

itemDeliveryPromise.description: Promised delivery information for the item.

startTime.description: The date and time of the start of the promised delivery window in ISO 8601 format.

endTime.description: The date and time of the end of the promised delivery window in ISO 8601 format.

ItemDeliveryPromise.description: Promised delivery information for the item.

serviceLocationType.description: The location of the service job.

x-docgen-enum-table-extension.description: Indicates the service for the service job is performed at the customers home address.
Indicates the service for the service job is performed at the service providers store.
Indicates the service for the service job is performed remotely.

address.description: The shipping address for the service job.

ServiceLocation.description: Information about the location of the service job.

name.description: The name of the person, business, or institution.

addressLine1.description: The first line of the address.

postalCode.description: The postal code. This can contain letters, digits, spaces, and/or punctuation.

countryCode.description: The two digit country code, in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format.

Address.description: The shipping address for the service job.

startTime.description: The date, time in UTC for the start time of an appointment in ISO 8601 format.

durationInMinutes.description: The duration of an appointment in minutes.

ErrorList.description: A list of error responses returned when a request is unsuccessful.

code.description: An error code that identifies the type of error that occurred.

message.description: A message that describes the error condition in a human-readable form.

details.description: Additional details that can help the caller understand or fix the issue.

x-docgen-enum-table-extension.description: Error
Warning

Error.description: Error response returned when the request is unsuccessful.

WarningList.description: A list of warnings returned in the sucessful execution response of an API request.

code.description: An warning code that identifies the type of warning that occurred.

message.description: A message that describes the warning condition in a human-readable form.

details.description: Additional details that can help the caller understand or address the warning.

Warning.description: Warning returned when the request is successful, but there are important callouts based on which API clients should take defined actions.

RangeSlotCapacityErrors.description: The error response schema for the `getRangeSlotCapacity` operation.

capacities.description: Array of range capacities where each entry is for a specific capacity type.

nextPageToken.description: Next page token, if there are more pages.

RangeCapacity.description: Range capacity entity where each entry has a capacity type and corresponding slots.

capacityType.description: Capacity type corresponding to the slots.

slots.description: Array of capacity slots in range slot format.

RangeSlot.description: Capacity slots represented in a format similar to availability rules.

startDateTime.description: Start date time of slot in ISO 8601 format with precision of seconds.

endDateTime.description: End date time of slot in ISO 8601 format with precision of seconds.

FixedSlotCapacityErrors.description: The error response schema for the `getFixedSlotCapacity` operation.

slotDuration.description: The duration of each slot which is returned. This value will be a multiple of 5 and fall in the following range: 5 <= `slotDuration` <= 360.

capacities.description: Array of capacity slots in fixed slot format.

nextPageToken.description: Next page token, if there are more pages.

FixedSlot.description: In this slot format each slot only has the requested capacity types. This slot size is as specified by slot duration.

startDateTime.description: Start date time of slot in ISO 8601 format with precision of seconds.

scheduledCapacity.description: Scheduled capacity corresponding to the slot. This capacity represents the originally allocated capacity as per resource schedule.

availableCapacity.description: Available capacity corresponding to the slot. This capacity represents the capacity available for allocation to reservations.

encumberedCapacity.description: Encumbered capacity corresponding to the slot. This capacity represents the capacity allocated for Amazon Jobs/Appointments/Orders.

reservedCapacity.description: Reserved capacity corresponding to the slot. This capacity represents the capacity made unavailable due to events like Breaks/Leaves/Lunch.

payload.description: Contains the `UpdateScheduleRecords` for which the error/warning has occurred.

SetAppointmentFulfillmentDataRequest.description: Input for set appointment fulfillment data operation.

startTime.description: The date, time in UTC of the fulfillment start time in ISO 8601 format.

endTime.description: The date, time in UTC of the fulfillment end time in ISO 8601 format.

FulfillmentDocuments.description: List of documents captured during service appointment fulfillment.

uploadDestinationId.description: The identifier of the upload destination. Get this value by calling the `createServiceDocumentUploadDestination` operation of the Services API.

contentSha256.description: Sha256 hash of the file content. This value is used to determine if the file has been corrupted or tampered with during transit.

FulfillmentDocument.description: Document that captured during service appointment fulfillment that portrays proof of completion

AppointmentResources.description: List of resources that performs or performed job appointment fulfillment.

AppointmentResource.description: The resource that performs or performed appointment fulfillment.

payload.description: `CreateReservationRecord` contains only the new `reservationId` if the operation was successful. Otherwise it will contain the reservation entity with warnings/errors.
`UpdateReservationRecord` contains only the new `reservationId` if the operation was successful. Otherwise it will contain the reservation entity with warnings/errors.

x-docgen-enum-table-extension.description: Monday.
Tuesday.
Wednesday.
Thursday.
Friday.
Saturday.
Sunday.

daysOfWeek.description: Days of the week when recurrence is valid. If the schedule is valid every Monday, input will only contain `MONDAY` in the list.

daysOfMonth.description: Days of the month when recurrence is valid.

Recurrence.description: Repeated occurrence of an event in a time range.

startTime.description: Denotes the time from when the resource is available in a day in ISO-8601 format.

endTime.description: Denotes the time till when the resource is available in a day in ISO-8601 format.

recurrence.description: Recurrence object containing the recurrence pattern of schedule.

capacity.description: Signifies the capacity of a resource which is available.

AvailabilityRecord.description: `AvailabilityRecord` to represent the capacity of a resource over a time range.

AvailabilityRecords.description: List of `AvailabilityRecord`s to represent the capacity of a resource over a time range.

reservationId.description: Unique identifier for a reservation. If present, it is treated as an update reservation request and will update the corresponding reservation. Otherwise, it is treated as a new create reservation request.

x-docgen-enum-table-extension.description: Reduce resource (store) capacity because of an appointment.
Reduce resource (store) capacity because technician(s) are travelling.
Reduce resource (store) capacity because technician(s) are on vacation.
Reduce resource (store) capacity because technician(s) are on break.
Reduce resource (store) capacity because technician(s) are in training.

availability.description: `AvailabilityRecord` to represent the capacity of a resource over a time range.

Reservation.description: Reservation object reduces the capacity of a resource.

availability.description: Availability record if the operation failed.

UpdateScheduleRecord.description: `UpdateScheduleRecord` entity contains the `AvailabilityRecord` if there is an error/warning while performing the requested operation on it.

reservation.description: Reservation record if the operation failed. It will only contain the new `reservationId` if the operation is successful.

CreateReservationRecord.description: `CreateReservationRecord` entity contains the `Reservation` if there is an error/warning while performing the requested operation on it, otherwise it will contain the new `reservationId`.

reservation.description: Reservation record if the operation failed. It will only contain the new `reservationId` if the operation is successful.

UpdateReservationRecord.description: `UpdateReservationRecord` entity contains the `Reservation` if there is an error/warning while performing the requested operation on it, otherwise it will contain the new `reservationId`.

RangeSlotCapacityQuery.description: Request schema for the `getRangeSlotCapacity` operation. This schema is used to define the time range and capacity types that are being queried.

capacityTypes.description: An array of capacity types which are being requested. Default value is `[SCHEDULED_CAPACITY]`.

startDateTime.description: Start date time from which the capacity slots are being requested in ISO 8601 format.

endDateTime.description: End date time up to which the capacity slots are being requested in ISO 8601 format.

FixedSlotCapacityQuery.description: Request schema for the `getFixedSlotCapacity` operation. This schema is used to define the time range, capacity types and slot duration which are being queried.

capacityTypes.description: An array of capacity types which are being requested. Default value is `[SCHEDULED_CAPACITY]`.

slotDuration.description: Size in which slots are being requested. This value should be a multiple of 5 and fall in the range: 5 <= `slotDuration` <= 360.

startDateTime.description: Start date time from which the capacity slots are being requested in ISO 8601 format.

endDateTime.description: End date time up to which the capacity slots are being requested in ISO 8601 format.

schedules.description: List of schedule objects to define the normal working hours of a resource.

x-docgen-enum-table-extension.description: This capacity represents the originally allocated capacity as per resource schedule.
This capacity represents the capacity available for allocation to reservations.
This capacity represents the capacity allocated for Amazon Jobs/Appointments/Orders.
This capacity represents the capacity made unavailable due to events like Breaks/Leaves/Lunch.

reservation.description: `Reservation` object to reduce the capacity of a resource.
`Reservation` object to reduce the capacity of a resource.

payload.description: The appointment slots fetched based on service context.

endTime.description: End Time up to which the appointment slots are generated in ISO 8601 format.

appointmentSlots.description: A list of time windows along with associated capacity in which the service can be performed.

startTime.description: Time window start time in ISO 8601 format.

endTime.description: Time window end time in ISO 8601 format.

capacity.description: Number of resources for which a slot can be reserved.

contentType.description: The content type of the to-be-uploaded file

contentLength.description: The content length of the to-be-uploaded file

contentMD5.description: An MD5 hash of the content to be submitted to the upload destination. This value is used to determine if the data has been corrupted or tampered with during transit.

ServiceUploadDocument.description: Input for to be uploaded document.

CreateServiceDocumentUploadDestination.description: The response schema for the `createServiceDocumentUploadDestination` operation.

uploadDestinationId.description: The unique identifier to be used by APIs that reference the upload destination.

url.description: The URL to which to upload the file.

headers.description: The headers to include in the upload request.

standard.description: The encryption standard required to encrypt or decrypt the document contents.
